Class DrawPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • DrawPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class DrawPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    Class of the drawpanel, which is used to add vertices/edges, to move vertices/edges, to remove vertices/edges.
    Also there will be the loaded graph and the Dijkstra algorithm be displayed.

    Author:
    C. Bruckmann, R. Wagner
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • loadFile

        public boolean loadFile(java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Function to construct a graph from a .txt file, as soon as the graph is completed
        the newly constructed graph gets relocated by a force directed algorithm.

        Parameters:
        path -
        Returns:
        true if the file could be read in without any problems and returns false if a non- .txt file is chosen or if the path does not exist or if there are any inconsistencies in the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
